sentences.en: As a result, childhood migraines are often dismissed as sinus headaches.
sentences.cn: 结果, 儿童偏头痛经常被误诊为窦性头痛.

sentences.en: Carotid sinus pressure has little or no effect on the atrial rate in atrial flutter.
sentences.cn: 压迫颈动脉窦对心房扑动时的心房率几乎不起作用.

sentences.en: Chronic sinus symptoms are associated with allergic rhinitis, asthma, and nasal polyposis.
sentences.cn: 慢性鼻窦炎症状与过敏性鼻炎 、 哮喘及鼻息肉有关.

sentences.en: Excessive sympathetic drive is by far the most common cause of sinus tachycardia.
sentences.cn: 过份的交感冲动是窦性心动过速最常见的原因.

sentences.en: I still suffer from catarrh and sinus problems.
sentences.cn: 我仍然患有黏膜炎和鼻窦炎。

sentences.en: Left sinus of valsalva was devoid of left coronary artery.
sentences.cn: 左冠状窦内无左冠状动脉起源.

sentences.en: Objective : To correctly diagnose and treat sphenoid sinus disease.
sentences.cn: 目的: 提高孤立性蝶窦病变的诊断率和治疗率.

sentences.en: OBJECTIVE To improve the CT diagnosis of ossifying fibroma in paranasal sinus.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨鼻窦骨化纤维瘤的CT诊断.

sentences.en: Objective To put forward anatomy parameter about the cavernous sinus for microneurosurgery.
sentences.cn: 目的为海绵窦显微外科手术提供解剖学参数.

sentences.en: Reversion to sinus rhythm , by means of electrical countershock , is indicated.
sentences.cn: 可用电除颤使恢复窦性 节律 .

sentences.en: Sinus bradycardia occurs when the heart rate falls below 60.
sentences.cn: 窦性心动过缓是心率低于60次.

sentences.en: Sinus rhythm can often be maintained with quinidine.
sentences.cn: 奎宁丁常可用以维持窦性节律.

sentences.en: The rest of the systemic venous return is diverted into the right horn of the sinus.
sentences.cn: 其余的体静脉回流转到静脉窦右角.

sentences.en: They can block air passages or sinus channels to cause a variety of grief.
sentences.cn: 它们能阻塞气道或鼻窦的通道,造成各种痛苦.

sentences.en: This normal variation in rhythm is known as sinus arrhythmia.
sentences.cn: 节律的这种正常变化称为窦性心律失常.

words.tran_cn: [生物]窦；静脉窦；下陷或凹下去的地方

phrases.tran_cn: 颈动脉窦，主动脉弓压力感受性反射

trans.tran_cn: 弯曲处，凹陷处，[解]窦，窦道，[植]弯缺，（软体动物的）弯
trans.tran_en: your sinuses are the spaces in the bones of your head that are connected to the inside of your nose
